    java.io.Serializable
    public class Megadungeon
extends Dungeon
    Individual floots that make up a single megadungeon for DungeonDelve.

    • Field Detail

      • FEATURES

        public static final java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends Feature>> FEATURES
        Since DungeonDelve characters cannot rely on usual Districts to train, spend money on and heal, these features are artifically boosted on the Megadungeon. Note that Chests here will be turned into special chests with a Wish Ruby inside, to make up for the aggravated lack of balancing for Dungeon-only play in Javelin. Roughly half of it should be resting/healing features since that's the most important for basic survival.
